item.title: I dont even no -.- just help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

	public String Illegal[] = {"~", "_", "!", "@", "#", "$", "(", ")", ";", "'", ",", ".", "/", "?", ":", "[", "{", "]", "}", "|", "%", "^", "&", "*", "  ", "£"};

and, in your initialize method;

for (int i = 0; i < Illegal.length; i++) { if (playerName.toLowerCase().contains(Illegal[i])) { if (checkbannedusers() != 5) { writeLog(playerName, "Banned"); disconnected = true; } } }

Edit it to work for your server.

item.title: I dont even no -.- just help
item.dc:creator: @12igon8 12igon8
item.description:
@12igon8 wrote:

lol it kinda is funny…
dude do

Code:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
public int kickTimer = 0;
public void badNames() {
if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&")
|| playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">")
|| playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains(“admin”) || playerName.contains(“owner”) || playerName.contains(“Admin”) || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{")
|| playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains(“SYI”)
|| playerName.contains(“SYIpkpker”) || playerName.contains(“null”) || playerName.contains(“fuck”) || playerName.contains(“bitch”)) {
if(kickTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back.");
if(checkbannedusers() != 5) {
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
checkbannedusers();
}
kickTimer = 20;
}
}


if that doesnt work just delete the code for the kicking…
make sure u don’t delete stuff that u need…

HAVE FUN!!!

item.description:
@Guthix_Rule wrote:

Try

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } Lol probably wont work but its worth a shot? Just put that anywhere

item.title: I dont even no -.- just help
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

ok when someone uses 2 bad names it screws up and they cant log in til the next restart

ok heres wat i mean heres the server box info

- SilabGarza v6.1 - Online - Accepting localhost: 3048. UserId: 68823094 Bad Username: Failed for 'gir ' UserId: 68823094 Bad Username: Failed for 'gir ' Rejected localhost:3051

in other words when u use 2 bad names, the 3rd time, my anti null system kicks in and just rejects all ther econnections…

apparently when they use a bad name it makes it into a null… and thats not a gud thing…

oh ya and also… heres the code that blocks bad names

if (!playerName.matches("[A-Za-z0-9]+[A-Za-z0-9_ ]*[A-Za-z0-9]+") || playerName.matches("[A-Za-z0-9_ ]*(__|_ | _| )+[A-Za-z0-9_ ]*")) { System.out.println("Bad Username: Failed for '"+playerName+"'"); returnCode = 4; playerName = "_"; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); disconnected = true; logout(); System.out.println(playerName+" - banned for use of an illegal name."); return; }

tell me wats up with it plawks?

Read full topic
